verses.verse: To the <S%H5329>chief<s%> <S%H5329>Musician<s%> on <S%H5058>Neginoth,<s%> A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> <S%H6030>Hear<s%> me when I <S%H7121>call,<s%> O <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H6664>righteousness:<s%> you have <S%H7337>enlarged<s%> me when I was in <S%H6862>distress;<s%> have <S%H2603>mercy<s%> on me, and <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H8605>prayer.<s%>

O you <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H376>men,<s%> <S%H5704>how<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> will you turn my <S%H3519>glory<s%> into <S%H3639>shame?<s%> how long will you <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H7385>vanity,<s%> and <S%H1245>seek<s%> after <S%H3577>leasing?<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

But <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H6395>set<s%> <S%H6395>apart<s%> him that is <S%H2623>godly<s%> for himself: the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H8085>hear<s%> when I <S%H7121>call<s%> to him.
Stand in <S%H7264>awe,<s%> and <S%H2398>sin<s%> not: <S%H559>commune<s%> with your own <S%H3824>heart<s%> on your <S%H4904>bed,<s%> and be <S%H1826>still.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
<S%H2076>Offer<s%> the <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> and put your <S%H982>trust<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

There be <S%H7227>many<s%> that <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> will <S%H7200>show<s%> us any <S%H2896>good?<s%> <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H5375>lift<s%> you up the <S%H216>light<s%> of your <S%H6440>countenance<s%> on us.
You have <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H8057>gladness<s%> in my <S%H3820>heart,<s%> more than in the <S%H6256>time<s%> that their <S%H1715>corn<s%> and their <S%H8492>wine<s%> <S%H7231>increased.<s%>

I will <S%H3162>both<s%> <S%H7901>lay<s%> me <S%H7901>down<s%> in <S%H7965>peace,<s%> and <S%H3462>sleep:<s%> for you, <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H910>only<s%> make me <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H983>safety.<s%>
